kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=api_session, url=http://localhost:3000, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=http://localhost:3000/api/users/1 path_url=/api/users/1 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.4', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
